cu.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failure and prevent proper hardware log initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an unknown enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failure and prevent proper hardware log initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌等級設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致日誌配置失敗，並阻止正確的硬體日誌初始化。
